casebody.data:
ACTION GAMING, INC. and IGT, Plaintiffs-Cross Appellants, v. ALLIANCE GAMING CORP. and United Coin Machine Co., Defendants-Appellants, and Bally Gaming, Inc., Defendant. Nos. 05-1287, -1315. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. July 11, 2006.

Before MAYER, LOURIE, and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM:

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
